doc.title: Footage: Surveying the City
doc.plot: 'Footage' is a digital video contains several live 'scenes' from spaces in various locations within the city of Providence, Rhode Island. The city is widely known for its ties to the Mafia, mythic architecture, narrow alleyways, unconventional characters and subterranean crime scene. This project is an attempt to share the serendipitous moments, human interactions and bizarre surrounding spaces encountered while roaming the streets of Providence.
